0.text: Bug 106272  Chart Selector dialog incorrectly parented.

1.text: Eclipse 3.1, GEF 3.1, EMO-SDO-SDK 2.1.0, BIRT 1.0.1 GTK+ 2.6.8 (Debian Linux)  In the report editor, click on "chart" in the palette and click back on the layout to add a chart.

3.text: However, while the dialog is modal, it does not seem to have the Eclipse window as its parent.

4.text: Under Linux, this gives some interesting effects.

5.text: Even though the dialog is modal, you can minimize it and move the Eclipse window in front of it, which can be quite confusing.

6.text: The dialog should be created with a parent.
